Activity: Prepare for the team meeting by reviewing notes and ensuring all materials are ready.
Conduct the team meeting to discuss optimization results, load testing outcomes, and next steps.
Gather feedback from the team on the presentation and discuss possible further improvements.
Work on implementing any actionable feedback received from the team during the meeting.
Review the week's progress and prepare a weekly report for upper management emphasizing performance improvements.
Send the weekly report along with any follow-up items to @prod-1 for review.
